info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 13 at 4:56PM MDT until July 13 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PROWERS AND SOUTHEASTERN KIOWA COUNTIES... At 455 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles north of Bristol, or 20 miles northeast of Lamar, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and three inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Granada, Hartman and Bristol. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
